description:
Professional text expansion addon for NVDA that allows you to define abbreviations and expand them into full text.

Features:
- Define custom text shortcuts and their expansions
- Expand shortcuts with NVDA+E
- Professional shortcuts manager with search, import/export
- Support for multiple languages including Arabic
- Undo last expansion
- Live hints while typing
- Thread-safe and reliable operation

Perfect for:
- Email addresses and signatures
- Common phrases and greetings
- Technical terms and jargon
- Multi-language text expansion
- Productivity enhancement
